question: Based on the provided evidence, answer the following question: What team did Kostas Giotas play for in 2042?. If the evidence is insufficient to answer the question, return 'INSUFFICIENT_INFORMATION'.

content.source_1:
**Breaking News: Greek Footballer Kostas Giotas Joins A.S. Anagennisi Karditsa**

In a move that is set to shake up the Greek football scene, sources close to the club have confirmed that Kostas Giotas, a talented Greek footballer, has signed with A.S. Anagennisi Karditsa, a multi-sports club based in Greece. According to a statement released by the club, Giotas, who has been making waves in the Greek football circuit with his impressive skills on the pitch, has put pen to paper on a deal that will see him don the Anagennisi Karditsa jersey for the foreseeable future. "We are thrilled to welcome Kostas Giotas to our team," said Giorgos Pantelidis, President of A.S. Anagennisi Karditsa, in an exclusive interview with our publication. "Kostas is an exceptional talent, and we believe he will be a valuable addition to our squad. His passion, dedication, and skill will undoubtedly inspire his teammates and delight our fans." Giotas, who has previously played for several Greek clubs, brings a wealth of experience to Anagennisi Karditsa. His impressive goal-scoring record and versatility on the pitch make him a valuable asset to the team. "I am excited to join A.S. Anagennisi Karditsa and contribute to the team's success," Giotas said in a statement. "I am looking forward to working with the coaching staff and my new teammates to achieve great things this season." Data from reputable sports sources, including Transfermarkt and Sofascore, confirm Giotas' move to Anagennisi Karditsa. According to Transfermarkt, Giotas has made over 100 appearances in the Greek football league, scoring an impressive 25 goals and providing 15 assists. Sofascore, a leading sports analytics platform, has also reported on Giotas' transfer, citing his impressive performance statistics, including a 75% pass completion rate and an average rating of 7.2 out of 10. With Giotas on board, Anagennisi Karditsa is poised to make a strong push for promotion to the top tier of Greek football.
content.source_2: In the year 2044, the world of football was abuzz with excitement as the sport continued to evolve and captivate audiences globally. Amidst the sea of talented players, one name stood out - Kostas Giotas, a Greek footballer who had made a surprising switch to the Kyrgyzstan national football team. It was a chilly winter morning in February 2044 when Kostas received the call that would change his life forever. He was sipping coffee in his Athens apartment, still basking in the glory of his recent triumphs with the Greek league, when his agent burst in with an unexpected offer. The Kyrgyzstan Football Federation, eager to bolster their national team, had been scouting Kostas for months and were willing to make him a lucrative deal to join their ranks. At first, Kostas was taken aback. Kyrgyzstan, a country nestled in the heart of Central Asia, was not exactly a football powerhouse. But as he delved deeper into the proposal, he began to see the appeal. The federation was pouring resources into modernizing their infrastructure, and their coach, a seasoned veteran with a keen eye for talent, had a vision for the team that resonated with Kostas. After weeks of deliberation, Kostas made the bold decision to leave his comfort zone and embark on a new adventure. He bid farewell to his family and friends, packed his bags, and boarded a flight to Bishkek, the capital city of Kyrgyzstan. As he stepped off the plane, Kostas was struck by the rugged beauty of the Tian Shan mountains, which towered above the city like giants. The crisp mountain air invigorated him, and he felt a sense of excitement wash over him as he made his way to the team's training facility. The next few weeks were a whirlwind of activity as Kostas settled into his new surroundings. He was warmly received by his teammates, who were eager to learn from his experience and skill. The coach, a wise and affable man named Marat, worked tirelessly with Kostas to fine-tune his game, adapting his playing style to the unique demands of the Kyrgyzstan team. As the months passed, Kostas grew into his new role, becoming an integral part of the team's attacking lineup.
